title: Evaluation of saffron yield using machine learning and remote sensing techniques in the face of climate change
description: In the face of climate change, saffron cultivation is experiencing new challenges. Altered temperature and precipitation patterns, along with the increasing occurrence of extreme weather events, impact saffron yield and quality. Accurate and timely yield estimation is crucial for farmers to adapt their practices and optimize saffron production to mitigate the effects of a changing climate.

title: National conference of practical methods to solve the technical problems of the country's water balance
description:
The National Conference on Applied Methods for Solving Technical Water Balance Issues in the Country was held on November 21, 2022, in Tehran, organized by the University of Tehran and the Tadbir Ab Think Tank.
In this conference, 52 research papers were presented by 194 researchers across key thematic areas.
The presented papers primarily focused on topics such as water balance and precipitation, water balance accounting, water resources balance, hydroclimatological balance, geostatistics, remote sensing, and evaporation (Thornthwaite method).
